plot: A Detective, sick of the justice system, forces six people into a building, inside they must face off with their worst nightmares. In one grueling night they must decide what's worth living for and what they'd kill for.
title: By a Strand
plot_es: A Detective, sick of the justice system, forces six people into a building, inside they must face off with their worst nightmares. In one grueling night they must decide what's worth living for and what they'd kill for.
plot_en: A Detective, sick of the justice system, forces six people into a building, inside they must face off with their worst nightmares. In one grueling night they must decide what's worth living for and what they'd kill for.
